metadata.title: CVE-2018-20683 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
commands/rsync in Gitolite before 3.6.11, if .gitolite.rc enables rsync,mishandles the rsync command line, which allows attackers to have a "bad"impact by triggering use of an option other than -v, -n, -q, or -P.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20683` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gitolite3 - 3.6.11-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gitolite3 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.11-2').
